resources.string: by login you are agreeing to our privacy policy

Zene is a free music app dedicated to providing unlimited access to your favorite tunes without any cost. While our core features remain free, Premium is for music enthusiasts who want exclusive benefits. Music enthusiasts support helps keep Zene free for everyone. Join our Premium family and elevate your music experience today!
Upgrade if your are a music enthusiasts
Share Zene with friends and family
Zene premium is more for music enthusiast

At Zene, we believe music should be accessible to everyone, which is why our app provides unlimited access to your favorite tunes completely free of charge. We are committed to never charging you a penny to enjoy music on our platform. Our goal is to create a space where everyone can experience the joy of music without any barriers. \n\n However, for the true music enthusiasts who want to take their listening experience to the next level, we offer a Premium option. Premium is designed for those who seek exclusive benefits and a more immersive experience. By upgrading to Premium, you not only unlock advanced features but also support Zene in maintaining and improving our services. Your contribution helps us keep the app free for all users, ensuring that everyone can enjoy high-quality music without any cost.
Displays the current playing music, including the song title, artist name, and album artwork, providing a visually engaging experience while you enjoy your favorite tracks.
Try after a seconds. Fetching video details....
Currently you cannot follow more than 40 artists at a time.
You have not saved or created a playlists.
Are you sure want to remove?
This playlist will be remove from your music library. Do you want to continue!!
This song will be remove from this playlist. Do you want to continue!!
No song found in this playlists
Equalizer not found. Zene don\'t have a build-in equalizer. Please install a equalizer rom play store and enjoy.
You currently have no listening history. Start playing some songs, and we\'ll be able to suggest playlists, songs, albums, and artists tailored to your preferences.
Need overlay permission to show playing song view on Lockscreen.
Clearing cache will remove all unwanted cache stored and not any personal data.
Zene need notification permission to show music player on lockscreen and at notification bar. Please enable it in App Permission -> Notifications or Notification -> Enable Switch..
Zene need microphone permission to listen to the song and search the database.
No song found. Please try again!
Oops! It looks like you haven\'t followed any artists yet. Start following your favorite artists to get personalized news updates in your feed!
Loading Please Wait.. Make sure your device can hear the song clearly. That you want to search..
Download this ad free Music app

Post a review on Play Store
No 5 star, Help us improve by sharing your thoughts and feedbacks.
Song Quality updated successfully. Restarting the song.

Zene saves your song history from the last two weeks and also keep history of your top listened songs. By storing only the most recent listening data, Zene reduces database costs, allowing us to offer the app for free. This doesn\'t impact your song suggestions or overall experience.
Enjoy Free Music Anytime on Your Laptop and Other Devices with Zene Web
No radio of this language in your country
Frequent buffering and delay is caused by the radio station, not the Zene app.
Enable picture-in-picture mode from Apps settings. To play in background.
Setting a sleep timer will automatically stop the music at the selected time.
Setting a wake-up timer will automatically start playing the music at the selected time as an music alarm.
Need permission so app can schedule alarm.
Your song has been paused as scheduled. Sweet dreams!
You haven\'t selected a song. If you set a wake-up alarm, the last song you played will automatically start.
Long press on any song and click on "add to wake-up timer".
Song will stop when song ends
Please enter a valid email address.
Error while sending email, Please try again.
Log in effortlessly with a secure link sent directly to your email. No passwords required!

We\'ve sent an email from no-reply@zenemusic.co to your inbox. Please open the email on this device and click the "Sign in to Zene" link (in blue) to complete your login. If you donâ€™t see the email, be sure to check your spam or junk folder.

Earphones Tracker and Finder is a convenient feature designed to help you locate your misplaced or lost earphones and Bluetooth audio devices. With features like tracking, location history, and customizable alerts.
No devices have been added to tracker. Tap the ðŸŽ§ icon to add one.
Bluetooth permission is required to detect and list all connected headphones and Bluetooth devices.
Enable GPS to let Zene track devices and display your activity records.

To register your records, we need access to your location. Please enable location access by following these steps: 

1. Tap 'Grant' 
2. Navigate to 'Permissions' 
3. Select 'Location' 
4. Choose 'Allow All the Time' 
Once you've done this, everything will be ready to go!
You\'re all set to listen. Enjoy your audio!
Audio will now play through your device speakers.
Removing this device will disable all active alerts and delete any scheduled updates associated with it.
Want to keep track of your earphones? Add them to your collection now!
Location Permission in app was disabled
No updates found, you can view when earphones are connected, disconnected, etc.
Zene need to verify your phone number to enable zene connect.
